text: Eghtɨ Babilonia izɨ, Jerusalemɨn nguibar ekiam ekɨarugh nguazim gɨku dɨvazim boroghɨn dar pozibav mɨkɨnigham. Egh me nguazir pozir kabagh isɨn tuivigh ikɨ mɨdorozim damuam. Me kamagh nɨghnɨgha ghaze, gumazir avɨrim arɨghiregham. Eghtɨ Isipɨn atrivimɨn mɨdorozir gumazir avɨrir bar gavgavim, mɨdorozimɨn dughiamɨn izɨ men akuraghan kogham.
